text: Melt 2 tbsp. (30 ml) butter over medium heat in the sauté pan or small pot. Let the butter melt, but do not let it brown. Combine 1/4 cup (60 ml) brown sugar with the melted butter. Stir the mixture until the brown sugar melts and makes a thick syrup. Add 1/4 cup (60 ml) pineapple juice, 3 tbsp. (45 ml) soy sauce, 3 tbsp. (45 ml) bourbon, 1 tbsp. (15 g) ginger and 1 tsp. (5 g) sesame seeds. Turn the heat up to medium-high and whisk until the mixture thickens enough to cling to the whisk. Turn off the burner and set the pot on a trivet or heat-safe surface. Let the mixture cool to room temperature. Transfer the glaze to an airtight container for refrigerator storage or use it immediately.
